TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JulianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit JulianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示儒略历。

span.span: Represents the Julian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在45公元前中，恺凭订购了日历改革，这将导致日历称为儒略历日历。In 45 B.C., Julius Caesar ordered a calendar reform, which resulted in the calendar called the Julian calendar. 儒略历是公历的前置日历。The Julian calendar is the predecessor of the Gregorian calendar. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用 .NET Framework 中的类和其他 calendar 类的信息，请参阅使用[日历](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars). 类仅识别当前纪元。The class recognizes only the current era. 与公历不同，儒略历将闰年定义为按四整除并且无例外的年份。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，日历每128年的某一天不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 一个常见年份有365天，闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 与公历类似，儒略历包含12个月，每个月28到31天：1月 (31 天) ，二月 (28 或29天) ，3月 (31 天) ，4月 (30 天) () 31 天 (，6月) 30 天 () ，2007年9月 () (30 天) ，10月 (30 天) Like the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 2月在闰年中有29天，在常见年份内有28天。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. 日期公元2001年1月1日The date January 1, 2001 A.D. 在公历中，相当于公元2000年12月19日in the Gregorian calendar is equivalent to the 19th day of December in the year 2000 A.D. 在儒略历。in the Julian calendar. 目前， 类所支持的任何区域性都不使用 。Currently, the is not used by any of the cultures supported by the class. 因此， 类只能用于计算 Julian 日历中的日期。Therefore, the class can be used only to calculate dates in the Julian calendar. 每个 对象都支持一组日历。Each object supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历， 属性返回一个数组，该数组包含该区域性支持的所有日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改使用的日历 ，应用程序应将的 属性设置 为新的 。To change the calendar used by a , the application should set the property of to a new .

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 示例：日历周范围实用工具

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

param.name: time
param.span: 将向其添加月数的 。

span.span: The to which to add months.

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的月数。

summary.span: 返回与指定 相距指定月数的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: 将指定月数添加到指定的 中时得到的 。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期，则结果中的日部分 会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 如果生成的月份超出了指定的年份，则结果中的年份部分 会受到影响 。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此， 如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与 指定的相同 。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是10月（包含31天），指定的日期是该月的第31天，并且参数的值 `months` 为6，则生成的年份比指定年份多一，生成的月份是四月，而结果日为第30天，即4月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果参数的值 `months` 为负，则生成的值 早于指定的 。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的值的属性 始终相等 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以 `time` 通过调用方法来保留参数的属性 ，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例 根据儒略历显示的多个组件的值。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/juliancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/CS/juliancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar_AddGet/VB/juliancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

is less than -120000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成的日期不是结果年份的结果月份中的有效日期，则结果中的日部分 会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所得的月份部分将 保持与指定的相同 。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此， 如果生成的年份超出指定的纪元，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的的时间部分与 指定的相同 。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，2月有28天，在闰年有29天时除外。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年中2月29日的值，并且的值 `years` 为1，则生成的日期为下一年2月28日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date is the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果 `years` 为负，则生成的 早于指定的 。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的值的属性 始终相等 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以 `time` 通过调用方法来保留参数的属性 ，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的某一天定义为从该年的第一天开始的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如， 对于第一个月的第一天，返回1，在 上个月的最后一天返回该年份中的总天数。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year. 总数与返回的值相同 。The total is the same value as that returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例 根据儒略历显示的多个组件的值。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Julian calendar. summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

span.span: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.

span.span: A positive integer that indicates the leap month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 另外，如果日历不支持闰月，或者 和 未指定闰年，此方法将返回零。

span.span: Alternatively, this method returns zero if the calendar does not support a leap month, or if and do not specify a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在支持闰月的概念的日历中，闰月可以在特定月份之后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如， 方法返回1到13之间的一个数字，用于指示与指定日期关联的月份。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果一年的第八个月和第九个月之间有一个闰月，则该方法将为 第八个月返回8，为第八个月返回9，在第9个月返回10个月。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与公历不同，儒略历将闰年定义为按四整除并且无例外的年份。Unlike the Gregorian calendar, the Julian calendar defines a leap year as a year that is evenly divisible by four with no exceptions. 因此，日历每128年的某一天不准确。Therefore, the calendar is inaccurate by one day every 128 years. 例如，1999年不是闰年，而2000是。For example, the year 1999 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一个常见年份有365天，闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是指仅在闰年发生的日期。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在儒略历日历中，2月29日是唯一的闰日。In the Julian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的示例在 每个纪元的五年中，在第二个月的最后一天 (2 月) 。The following example calls for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/juliancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/juliancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.JulianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/juliancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 包含 的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以用两位数年份表示的100年范围内的最后一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 通过 `year` 在该100年范围内查找指定的唯一匹配项来确定纪元。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the specified `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果 设置为2029，则100年范围是从1930到2029。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1930，而两位数字的值29则解释为2029。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 如果将两位数的年份值 (小于 100) ，则会使方法根据表示相应世纪的值将值转换为四位值 。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供了在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值 ，则该方法将返回实际输入值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供了一个在支持的日历范围之外的四位数值，或者如果它提供负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许将两位数的年份正确翻译为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果将此属性设置为2029，则100年范围是从1930到2029。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1930，而两位数字的值29则解释为2029。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 类未检测到系统设置中的更改。The class does not detect changes in the system settings. 应用程序可以将此值设置为99，以指示要按字面取的两位数年份。The application can set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，如果将此属性设置为99，则100年的范围为 0 (不是大多数日历) 到99的有效值。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，两位数值30被解释为30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值小于 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值大于 。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在设置操作中，当前实例是只读的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
